pages.text:
PRIVATE EVENTS
PRIVATE & CORPORATE EVENTS WITH  BILL ABBOTT
PRIVATE EVENTS
Bill has created VIP guest experiences at social celebrations, anniversaries, birthdays, reunions and milestone events around the world leaving guests astounded. Bill‚Äôs goal is creating connection through his magic, humor and showmanship. At a recent party actor Samuel L. Jackson exclaimed, ‚ÄúThis man is incredible!‚Äù And when Bill read the mind of actress Charlize Theron, she yelled, ‚ÄúThat‚Äôs impossible.‚Äù
CORPORATE EVENTS
Bill has performed his magic for Fortune 500 companies around the globe. From retreats, sales meetings and awards banquets to receptions, team building weekends and trade show after parties, Bill‚Äôs focus is on dynamic magic-fueled in-person events that wow! Vanish Magazine declared Bill ‚ÄúOne of the most prolific and highly respected magicians in the world today.‚Äù
FEATURED ON
THREE WAYS TO AN UNFORGETTABLE EVENT
Cocktail Magic
Imagine mind blowing magic that happens in your guests hands and stunning mind reading with their own personal thoughts. During the cocktail hour Bill will astound guests up close and personally connecting everyone with magic, laughter and (sometimes) screams!
Dinner Magic
Keep the energy sparkling throughout your dinner reception with Bill Abbott‚Äôs jaw-dropping Dinner Magic performances that will have your guests laughing and engaged. Dinner Magic creates a lively atmosphere throughout the dinner time, animating your guests with dazzling up close magic!
Stage Show
Boost the engagement right after dinner with interactive, hilarious and unbelievable magic on stage. Bill will capture the attention of your guests, involving many of them with riveting illusions that will have everyone laughing, cheering and wondering how in the world it‚Äôs all possible?!

ABOUT BILL ABBOTT
MEET BILL ABBOTT  WORLD-RENOWNED MAGICIAN, CREATOR & MASTER SHOWMAN
Bill Abbott is an entrepreneur, magician and most of all a showman. Named Canadian Magician of the Year by the Canadian Association of Magicians, Bill Abbott has performed over 5000 shows in 11 countries.
Bill Abbott was born in Toronto into a musical family and entertained his first audience at five years old. After graduating university with degrees in psychology and sociology Bill developed into a sought-after corporate entertainer performing magic and mentalism at events for Fortune 500 companies around the globe.
Locally Bill became a fixture at the Toronto Film Festival movie premieres entertaining celebrities, dignitaries and film industry superstars.
He has become Florida‚Äôs premier magician, traveling the state and globe sharing his extraordinary showmanship and magic.
LEARN MORE ABOUT BOOKING BILL FOR A PRIVATE EVENT
"THIS MAN IS INCREDIBLE!"
SAMUEL L. JACSKSON
SEE MORE REVIEWS
"THAT'S IMPOSSIBLE!"
CHARLIZE THERON
SEE MORE REVIEWS
"ONE OF THE WORLD'S MOST PROLIFIC AND HIGHLY RESPECTED MAGICIANS IN THE WORLD TODAY."
VANISH MAGAZINE
SEE MORE REVIEWS
BILL ABBOTT'S
MAGICAL EXPERIENCE IN ST. AUGUSTINE, FL IS A MUST SEE!
After relocating to St. Augustine, Florida Bill has spent the last few years headlining the most exclusive boutique venues across the U.S. including performances at the Chicago Magic Lounge, The House Of Cards in Nashville, Tennessee, Mystique Dining in La Jolla, California and The World Famous Magic Castle in Hollywood, California.
In 2022, Bill partnered with hotelier
Richard Kessler
to create a weekly one-of-a-kind boutique magic show experience within St. Augustine‚Äôs most luxurious hotel the
Casa Monica Resort & Spa
, called the Magic¬† Hideaway.
Learn more about
Your Magic Hideaway Experience here
.
FEATURED ON
BILL ABBOTT
florida‚Äôs premier entertainer and creator of original magic
Author of 9 books and 40 online articles, in addition to 49 products created exclusively for professional performers, Bill Abbott has developed a popular and critically acclaimed instructional performance arts based production company. BAM (Bill Abbott Magic LLC) is an internationally recognized production company that equips, instructs, motivates and inspires thousands of professional performers around the globe.
VISIT BILL ABBOTT MAGIC RETAIL STORE
bill abbott says
what defines me today
‚ÄúSharing my performance art of magic and my role as a dad to my sons and best friend to my wife Rebecca.‚Äù
